cart_shipping_note: Shipping and taxes calculated at checkout.
collection_desc_warm_blanket: Wrap yourself in comfort. Cozy pyjamas and sleepwear for the dreamiest nights.
collection_desc_lazy: Do less, feel more. Hoodies, sweats, and everything your couch deserves.
product_desc_cloud_pyjama_set: Ultra-soft brushed cotton pyjama set with a relaxed fit. Features a button-front top and elastic-waist bottoms.
product_desc_dream_wrap_robe: Plush fleece robe with an oversized shawl collar and deep pockets. Your new favourite thing to never take off.
product_desc_sleepy_head_shorts: Lightweight sleep shorts in the softest modal blend. Perfect for warm nights or layering under the robe.
product_desc_midnight_slip_top: Silky camisole with delicate lace trim. Pairs beautifully with the Sleepy Head Shorts.
product_desc_cloud_nine_socks: Fuzzy crew socks with non-slip grips. The finishing touch for total cosiness.
product_desc_all_day_hoodie: Heavyweight French terry hoodie with a relaxed drop shoulder. Kangaroo pocket fits your phone, snacks, and ambitions.
product_desc_sunday_sweats: Tapered joggers in brushed fleece with a smooth outer. Elastic waist, ribbed cuffs, zero plans required.
product_desc_nap_champion_tee: Oversized tee in garment-dyed cotton. Pre-shrunk so it stays this perfect forever.
product_desc_couch_crew_sweatshirt: Classic crewneck sweatshirt with raglan sleeves. Midweight fleece that layers or stands alone.
product_desc_drift_off_shorts: French terry drawstring shorts with a 7-inch inseam. From the couch to the corner store and back.
product_desc_moonlight_matching_set: Satin-trimmed jersey set with a long-sleeve henley and tapered pants. Effortlessly elegant for bedtime.
product_desc_starry_night_set: Printed cotton voile set with a camp-collar top and drawstring shorts. Light as a summer evening.
product_desc_velvet_dream_set: Stretch velour lounge set with a cropped pullover and wide-leg pants. Feels like a hug you can wear.
product_desc_lullaby_sleep_tee: Relaxed-fit tee in bamboo-cotton blend. Breathable, thermoregulating, and impossibly soft against the skin.
product_desc_twilight_tank: Ribbed modal tank with a scalloped hem. Lightweight enough to sleep in, pretty enough to lounge in.
product_desc_hush_wrap_top: Cross-front wrap top in washed silk. Adjustable tie closure for a custom, flattering fit.
product_desc_starlight_sleep_pants: Full-length sleep pants in brushed cotton with a paper-bag waist. Roomy enough for the deepest sleep.
product_desc_dreamer_leggings: Second-skin leggings in buttery modal-spandex. From bed to yoga mat without changing.
product_desc_luna_lounge_shorts: High-waisted French terry shorts with a scalloped hem. A step up from your basic sleep shorts.
product_desc_cashmere_cocoon_cardigan: Oversized open-front cardigan in cashmere-wool blend. Wraps around you like a wearable blanket.
product_desc_morning_mist_kimono: Lightweight chiffon kimono with watercolour-print panels. The most beautiful thing your mornings have ever seen.
product_desc_featherlight_duster: Ankle-length duster in gauzy cotton. Dramatic and dreamy â€” perfect over any sleepwear.
product_desc_silk_eye_mask: Pure mulberry silk eye mask with an adjustable elastic band. Total darkness, zero pressure.
product_desc_lavender_sleep_scrunchie: Silk scrunchie set infused with dried lavender. Gentle on your hair, calming for your mind. Pack of three.
product_desc_bedside_slippers: Memory-foam slippers with a plush shearling lining. Your feet deserve this kind of welcome every morning.
product_desc_zip_up_chill_jacket: Full-zip French terry jacket with a stand collar and side pockets. The layer you grab on your way to anywhere.
product_desc_oversized_pullover: Boxy-fit fleece pullover with dropped shoulders and ribbed cuffs. Intentionally two sizes too big.
product_desc_weekend_tank: Relaxed-fit tank in slub cotton with raw-edge armholes. The official uniform of having no plans.
product_desc_do_nothing_crop_tee: Cropped boxy tee in heavyweight cotton. Pairs perfectly with any high-waisted bottom in the collection.
product_desc_snooze_logo_tee: Classic-fit tee with a small embroidered snooze motif. Soft ring-spun cotton that gets better with every wash.
product_desc_marathon_lounge_pants: Straight-leg lounge pants in brushed jersey. Elastic waist with an internal drawcord for the perfect fit.
product_desc_easy_wide_legs: Wide-leg pants in washed French terry with a palazzo silhouette. Maximum comfort, maximum drama.
product_desc_lazy_beanie: Chunky rib-knit beanie in soft acrylic. One size fits most heads and all moods.
product_desc_snooze_crew_socks: Cushioned crew socks in combed cotton with a ribbed cuff. Three-pack in coordinating colours.
product_desc_blanket_scarf: Oversized brushed-wool scarf that doubles as a lap blanket. Big enough to share, soft enough to keep.
product_desc_lounge_slides: Cushioned slides with a terry-cloth footbed. From the shower to the sofa in one easy step.
